General.Name: Syntek Semiconductor Co Ltd
General.Description: Syntek Semiconductor Co., Ltd. operates as a fabless IC design company in Asia. The company offers car DVRs/miniDVs, PC/NB camera controllers, and microcontrollers, as well as wireless power transmitters. It also develops products for photo capturing and video recording applications. In addition, the company offers wireless IP connected multimedia recording solutions; and system-on-chip solutions. Syntek Semiconductor Co., Ltd. was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.
